sentences.sentence: Their success does not necessarily reflect a leftward shift in politics.
sentences.translation: 他们的成功并不一定表示政治上转向左倾。

sentences.sentence: My head lazily leant leftward, close to Mum.
sentences.translation: 头懒洋洋地歪向左边，靠近了母亲。

sentences.sentence: Rightwards walk this time, get into leftward room after once seeing two clerks of the right side.
sentences.translation: 这一次向右走，看过右边的两份文书后，进入左方的房间。
